document.full_text: tunisia has made a good start in its transition to democracy but faces a major challenge in meeting people's expectations of fast progress, the chairman of europe's main rights and security watchdog said saturday.
document.title: tunisia makes "good start" on democratic path
lines_and_colors: tunisia has made a good start in its transition to democracy but faces a major challenge in meeting people's expectations of fast progress, the chairman of europe's main rights and security watchdog said saturday.
